Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: SDG
Reviews.Content: This is a nice little phone if you like Blackberries.It had all the features you could need and comes at quite a low price.Virgin Mobile however is not so amazing.In the couple months I've had this phone, they've had to remote reset it twice just so that my text messaging service would work.Their only redeeming quality is their low prices.All in all, I'm quite happy with this phone and provider. Just make sure you look up coverage before you buy since Virgin's coverage can be kinda spotty.

Reviews.Title: TRULY EXCELLENT VALUE!!
Reviews.Author: k_tree
Reviews.Content: This Blackberry Curve is a great small, compact but feature-filled cell phone. All the usual features work just fine, plus there are many terrific apps available at the Blackberry AppWorld Store, directly through the phone. Virgin Mobile's various plans let me pay for just what I need, with no contract.  That means no onerous "Early Termination Fees", like with the contract companies. Plus, I can change my plan as my needs change, and I'm not stuck with the same thing for the length of a contract. Personally, I'll never go back to a contract.

Reviews.Title: Very good product
Reviews.Author: LorraineJ
Reviews.Content: The BlackBerry 8530 is very fast, easy to operate, dependable, real small, and attractive. The only con I have with this phone is that it needs more applications, but this phone is very dependable. This is a good purchase. I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and works great!
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: I had earlier has an android, but I kept breaking the screens. I've been pretty short on money, so I just decided to at least try out the old blackberry. It's really sturdy and was just like new. I'm very happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Amazing phone for the price!
Reviews.Author: Angie
Reviews.Content: This phone works perfectly, is the right size, takes great pictures, and is just all around fantastic! It is just an awesome phone for the price and I love it. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: good but
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I put 5 stars cause this was my first blackberry I had it was good I use to love this phone but what I'm about to say is that we are in 2013 this phone is from 2010 3 years been passed and for the price they have it no way to much money I was gonna get it but the max I pay is $50 and it needs to be brand new not used I do not recommend buying used phones look at all this berries they are used and scratch for a high price no way get out no one uses this phone anymore smh for the high price not cool at all o well see ya

Reviews.Title: Moving on UP
Reviews.Author: Kim J. Love
Reviews.Content: I am finally moving up in my pay as you go phone. I've had my  basic phone for 5 years and so much has changed. I am still trying to figure out all the applications. But it waS very easy to transfer all my contacts from my old phone to my new Blackberry Curve...Many functions and more than I will ever need...

Reviews.Title: GREAT
Reviews.Author: djboogerbuttsik19
Reviews.Content: i just got the curve on virgin mobile works great plug n play easy set up drag my music from pc its cheap unlimited data you tube all that.

Reviews.Title: It works...
Reviews.Author: buyer5665
Reviews.Content: The only problem I've experienced with the phone is when the battery is running extremely low and needs to be charged the phone will disconnect from the "radio" (mobile carrier). Even after the battery charges you have to go online to figure out how to fix the problem. Until you reconnect to the "radio" you can't call any of your contacts or send text messages.

Reviews.Title: my blackberry 8530
Reviews.Author: lizzielynn
Reviews.Content: I love it it works wonderful Thankyou the delivery was prompt and the phone was in wonderful condition. I will shop for a phone again sometime thanks

Reviews.Title: Good cheap smartphone
Reviews.Author: K. Wood
Reviews.Content: An though this is an older phone it works well and it is not slow. Gets good internet service and you navigate with a mouse. And the buttons are on the smaller side. But phone works if your looking for a cheaper smartphone.

Reviews.Title: It was ok, so far.
Reviews.Author: molly
Reviews.Content: From day one stuff happened. I recieved it a few days past the expected delivery date, so that was a week and a few days there. When I finally recieved it and turned it on all of their contacts, messages, emails, pictures and other stuff was still in the phone. I had to sit for one hour with the Blackberry company to program it, at that time it was basically deleting and changing past info that was set in the phone. After that everything was going great, I was quite surprised! I had it for a couple days and after those couple days (about 2 or 3) I pressed the red power button and the whole screen came off!!! I put it back on as good as I could get it for about two more days, then the keys started not working. I had to go to just about every phone shop in town, to see if they could repair it. I had to go out of town to  phone shop that's charging me $90.00 for a new screen and keyboard, that's a whole front of the phone!! It is in the repair store now and I'm getting it at around saturday (next week). So, here goes another week without a phone, this time over nonsense! I decided not to bring the phone back because I really do want a Blackberry and have been waiting for one for a while now. The good part is that I do have a really good plan :) $35.00 a month for 300 voice minutes (talking on the phone) and the rest is unlimited!! I also love the keyboard and just the way the Blackberry feels, very productive, good camera, decent battery life I think, and more.

Reviews.Title: virgin mobile rocks
Reviews.Author: Ken Campbell "nowarken"
Reviews.Content: get it  if u can ?,(it,s not a iphone,)or a crapy, att,verizon one,it,s a Virgin Mobile!!its all we have now!!!and it works good to

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Lilly
Reviews.Content: The Blackberry phone was in excellent condition and I would have enjoyed using this phone but it is a CDMA and these type of phone don't work in my country.....ensure you have all the info so as to ensure that it can work in your country....

Reviews.Title: deceiving phone and service
Reviews.Author: thatguy
Reviews.Content: I purchased this BlackBerry 8530 Prepaid Phone for Virgin Mobile from Walmart for $100.00.  I am not going to write a long review so here it is.  The phone it self is good quality, the service and restrictions are very poor and just stupid all around.  The phone and service was advertised as "Unlimited Talk, Web, and Text for $45.00 a month.  Not true.  The first couple things that I did was to try to get on YouTube using the cellular network, that did not work, and post a picture to my Facebook wall using the cellular network and that did not work.  After both attempts it stated that a WiFi connection was needed to do that.  What a joke!!  Then it is not "Unlimited Talk, Web, and Text!"  Last time I checked, YouTube and Facebook were on the internet.  This was false advertising and misleading.  Most of the time I do not have a WiFi connection, and I figured with this phone I could use the internet over the cell network.  I basically live on Facebook and YouTube when I am on the internet, and I can't use this phone to to that when I am out and about.  All I can say is watch out.  I am very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Not very happy.
Reviews.Author: by esportslover18
Reviews.Content: Ad said it was new and never opened, but it was not. Had a TON of problems trying to activate it with virgin mobile because it was already used. Packaging was opened and resealed. The whole thing was a complete joke.

Reviews.Title: Aweful  really,  cheaply designed and made, small keys , not user friendly
Reviews.Author: M. Gehret "G-Man  Colorado"
Reviews.Content: this phone is a serious disappointment ,  poorly constructed, cheap feel, no quality at all. The setup is quite that, a long tiresome and pain to setup. The phone eats battery life, is frustrating, and a poor production from a usually good company.  I love their playbook, etc.

Reviews.Title: very, very-disappointing
Reviews.Author: M. Fore "nocando"
Reviews.Content: this phone has about 6 serious flaws that would for sure make you regret buying it.it will not not matian a bluetooth connection,it locks up ,the touch screen is very off and on how sensitive it is to pick up your selection.i wasted close to $300.00 for it and i just wish they had a recall on this phone.
